Yenan Sun

About
I'm a third-year PhD student in Linguistics at the University of Chicago.

Research interests
Broad: semantics, syntax-semantics interface
Narrow: quantification; modification (relative clauses, adjectives); identity terms (e.g. same), equatives, reciprocity

Contact: yenansun [at] uchicago [dot] edu
